original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṁ nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsuṁ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā parittam nakha sikhāyam pasum āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, ayaṁ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu khalu bahutara yaḥ vā ayam mayā parittaḥ pasu āropitaḥ ayam vā mahā pathavī iti
etat eva bhante bahutara yat idam mahā pathavī

original: Appamattako bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito.
analyzed: appamattakaḥ bhagavatā parittaḥ nakha sikhāyam pasu āropitaḥ

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti mahā pathavim upanidhāya bhagavatā parittaḥ nakhasikhāyam pasu āropitaḥ iti

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakassa diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etat eva bahutaram dukkham yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya yadidaṁ sattakkhattuṁparamatā.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti purimam dukkha kkhandham parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya yat idam satta kkhattu parama tā
evam mahatthiyaḥ kho bhikkhave dhamma abhisamayaḥ
evam mahatthiyaḥ dhamma cakkhu paṭilābho ti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanāni āyāmena paññāsayojanāni vitthārena paññāsayojanāni ubbedhena, puṇṇā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave pokkharaṇī paññāsa yojanāni āyāmena paññāsa yojanāni vitthārena paññāsa yojanāni ubbedhena puṇṇā udakassa sama tittikā kākapeyyā

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā kusaggena udakaṁ ubbhataṁ yaṁ vā pokkharaṇiyā udakan”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā kusaggena udakam ubbhatam yam vā pokkharaṇiyā udakanti
etat eva bhante bahutara yat idam pokkharaṇiyāḥ udaka

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti pokkharaṇiyā udakaṁ upanidhāya kusaggena udakaṁ ubbhatan”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti pokkharaṇiyāḥ udakam upanidhāya kusaggena udakam

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ; appamattakaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakassa diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etat eva bahutaram dukkham yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa appamattakam avasiṭṭha

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya, yadidaṁ sattakkhattuṁparamatā.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti purimam dukkha kkhandham parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya yat idam satta kkhattu parama tā

original: Evaṁ mahatthiyo kho, bhikkhave, dhammābhisamayo; evaṁ mahatthiyo dhammacakkhupaṭilābho”ti.
analyzed: evam mahatthiyaḥ kho bhikkhave dhamma abhisamayaḥ evam mahatthiyaḥ dhamma cakkhu paṭilābho ti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yatthimā mahānadiyo saṁsandanti samenti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yattha imāḥ mahā nadiyaḥ sasandanti samenti

original: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī, tato puriso dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni uddhareyya.
analyzed: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tatas purisaḥ dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni uddhareyya

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni yaṁ vā sambhejjaudakan”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu khalu bahutara yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni yam vā
etat eva bhante bahutaram yat idam sambhejja odaka

original: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni.
analyzed: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti sambhejjaudakaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatānī”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti sambhejja odakam upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yatthimā mahānadiyo saṁsandanti samenti, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yattha imāḥ mahā nadiyaḥ sasandanti samenti

original: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī, taṁ udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni.
analyzed: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī tam udakam parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā sambhejjaudakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā sambhejja odakam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni iti

original: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ sambhejjaudakaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: etat eva bhante bahutaram sambhejja odakam yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa

original: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni.
analyzed: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti

original: sambhejjaudakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti.
analyzed: sambhejja udakam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāpathaviyā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ mahā pathaviyā satta kolaṭṭhi mattiyaḥ guḷikāḥ upanikkhipeyya

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yā vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā yā vā mahāpathavī”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yāḥ vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyaḥ guḷikāḥ upanikkhittāḥ yā vā mahā pathavī iti
etat eva bhante bahutara yat idam mahā pathavī
appamattikā satta kolaṭṭhi mattiyaḥ guḷikā upanikkhittā

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti mahāpathaviṁ upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti mahā pathavim upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhi mattiyaḥ guḷikāḥ upanikkhittā ati

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāpathavī parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, ṭhapetvā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhikkhave mahā pathavī parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya ṭhapetvā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyaḥ guḷikā

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā mahāpathaviyā parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ yā vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā avasiṭṭhā”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā mahā pathaviyā parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam yāḥ vā satta kolaṭṭhi mattiyaḥ guḷikāḥ avasiṭṭhāti

original: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ, mahāpathaviyā, yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: etat eva bhante bahutara mahā pathaviyā yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti mahāpathaviyā parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā avasiṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti mahā pathaviyā parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhi mattiyaḥ guḷikāḥ avasiṭṭhāti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāsamuddato dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni uddhareyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ mahā samuddataḥ dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni uddhareyya

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni yaṁ vā mahāsamudde udakan”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu khalu bahutara yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni yam vā mahā samudde udakanti
etat eva bhante bahutara yat idam mahā samudde udaka

original: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatāni.
analyzed: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti mahāsamudde udakaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni ubbhatānī”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti mahā samudde udakam upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni ubbhatāni iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave mahā samuddaḥ parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya ṭhapetvā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā mahāsamudde udakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā mahā samudde udakam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam yāni vā dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni iti

original: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ mahāsamudde udakaṁ, yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: etat eva bhante bahutaram mahā samudde udaka yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa

original: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhāni.
analyzed: appamattakāni dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti

original: mahāsamudde udakaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni avasiṭṭhānī”ti.
analyzed: mahā samudde udakam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni avasiṭṭhāni iti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso himavato pabbatarājassa satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ himavataḥ pabbata rājassa satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhipeyya

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yā vā satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā yo vā himavā pabbatarājā”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yāḥ vā satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhittāḥ yaḥ vā himavā pabbata rājā ati
etat eva bhante bahutaram yat idam himavā pabbata rājā
appamattikā satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharā upanikkhittā

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti himavantaṁ pabbatarājānaṁ upanidhāya satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti himavantam pabbata rājānam upanidhāya satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhittā ati

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, himavā pabbatarājā parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya, ṭhapetvā satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave himavā pabbata rājā parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyya ṭhapetvā satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharā

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yaṁ vā himavato pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ yā vā satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yam vā himavataḥ pabbata rājassa parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam yāḥ vā satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ avasiṭṭhā ati

original: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṁ himavato pabbatarājassa yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: etat eva bhante bahutaram himavataḥ pabbata rājassa yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa
appamattikā satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ avasiṭṭhā

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti

original: himavato pabbatarājassa parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya satta sāsapamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā avasiṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: himavataḥ pabbata rājassa parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya satta sāsapa mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ avasiṭṭhāti

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etadeva bahutaraṁ dukkhaṁ yadidaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ;
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakassa diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa abhisametāvino etat eva bahutaram dukkham yat idam parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇa

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti purimaṁ dukkhakkhandhaṁ parikkhīṇaṁ pariyādiṇṇaṁ upanidhāya yadidaṁ sattakkhattuṁparamatā.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti purimam dukkha kkhandham parikkhīṇam pariyādiṇṇam upanidhāya yat idam satta kkhattu parama tā

original: Evaṁ mahatthiyo kho, bhikkhave, dhammābhisamayo, evaṁ mahatthiyo dhammacakkhupaṭilābho”ti.
analyzed: evam mahatthiyaḥ kho bhikkhave dhamma abhisamayaḥ evam mahatthiyaḥ dhamma cakkhu paṭilābho ti

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sinerussa pabbatarājassa satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sinerussa pabbata rājassa satta mugga mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhipeyya

original: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yā vā satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā yo vā sineru pabbatarājā”ti?
analyzed: katamam nu kho bahutara yāḥ vā satta muggamattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhittāḥ yaḥ vā sineru pabbata rājā ati
etat eva bhante bahutaram yat idam sineru pabbata rājā
appamattikā satta muggamattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharā upanikkhittā

original: Neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na sahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upenti sineruṁ pabbatarājānaṁ upanidhāya satta muggamattiyo pāsāṇasakkharā upanikkhittā”ti.
analyzed: na iva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na sata sahassimam kalam upenti sinerum pabbata rājānam upanidhāya satta mugga mattiyaḥ pāsāṇa sakkharāḥ upanikkhittā ati

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa adhigamaṁ upanidhāya
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave ariya sāvakassa diṭṭhi sampannassa puggalassa adhigamam upanidhāya

original: aññatitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṁ adhigamo neva satimaṁ kalaṁ upeti na sahassimaṁ
analyzed: añña titthiya samaṇa brāhmaṇa paribbājakānam adhigamaḥ na iva satimam kalam upeti na sahassima

original: kalaṁ upeti na satasahassimaṁ kalaṁ upeti.
analyzed: kalam upeti na sata sahassimam kalam upeti

original: Evaṁ mahādhigamo, bhikkhave, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo, evaṁ mahābhiñño”ti.
analyzed: evam mahā adhigamaḥ bhikkhave diṭṭhi sampannaḥ puggalaḥ evam mahā abhiñño ti
